TONI MORRISON READS, New York University, Elmer Holmes Bobst Library, 70 Washington Square South, Greenwich Village. Toni Morrison reads from her work as part of the New York University Creative Writing Program's reading series. Tonight at 7. Free. Information: (212) 998-8816.
